3 – udayanga wirathunga athadanguwata ganima sandahawana meheyuma pilibandawa – winadi 1.56 4- wathman deshapalana thaththwaya pilibanda paksha wipaksha adahas namathi wisheshangaya – meya wenkara thibune athadanguwe pasuwena namalge prashnaya pilibandawa deshapalanagnyayin kiyana kathawala kali pracharayataya – winadi 2.09 ( esbi, tilwin, ajith, bimal rathnayaka, yuenpi manthri bandula lal namalta wiruddhamatha ki athara, mahinda yapa abewardhana namalta erehiwa jawipe paminili kale ayida yana prashnaya mathukarana kotasak da athul kara thibuni ) 5 – daruwan ge aarakshawa pilibandawa wadagath prawruththiyak – winadi 1.30 6 – athyawashya aahara palana mila pilibandawa – winadi 2.57 7 – podu prawahana sewaya widhimath kirima sandaha nawa kramayak handunwadima – winadi 1.16 8 – deshiya puwath kihipayak luhundin winadi 2.29 ( pirisindu paniya jalaya illa thanamalwila janaya kala udgoshanayak, bas anathurak, gampaha jala widuli balagara wyapruthiyak ha bandunu parisarika prashna pilibanda udghoshanaya, benthota palamak indikirima pilibandawa kerena madhya amathige nirikshana charikawak ha kalpitiye sancharaka karmanthaya ha bandunu prashna.) 9 – thissamaharamaye indikerena shri naredra modi gammanaya ha iktawen lankawa sukhitha muditha wena aakaraya gana sajith premadasa kiyana katha – winadi 1.39 10 – mathara- beliaththa dum riya margaya gana nimal siripalage katha ha ohuge charikawa – winadi 2.13 11 – wides puwath – kisima mulashrayak nathiwa madhyayata nikuthwu darshana kiya, ruparamu penwamin pranshaye nis praharaya pilibandawa winadi 2.13 12 – krida puwath – sampurna kalaya winadi 2.23 yi, eyin winadi 1.43k akila wiraj sahabhagiwu pasal wolibol tharangawalikata, thath 40 yak prathamawarata lankawata ran padakkam ha wenath padakkam gena rusiyawe pawathi tharangawalikayata sahabhagiwi ena lankika sisun pilibandawa.
